post.body: Yeah, it's a good movie, I reviewed it here http://the1001movies.blogspot.com
Well I would need an editor, but I'm going to try to edit this one myself.
I have five blogs at blogspot. I am obsessed.
Hey, better Clinton than Palin.
If you'd taken better care of your technology, you could reboot it in an instant.
No, you failed the technology. Enough said.
Well you'd be silly.
Just restart your mac you fool.
Or because you couldn't edit it down.
Broccoli.
Explain something. Anything. As long as it's remotely interesting.
Yes, that is true. It's because there isn't enough of him, that's why.
Yes, that will be a wise choice for the future.
That would be most appropriate. I shall remember that one for the future.
just asked me what language jews speak. She says they speak Jewish.
You know, that is my bookshelf. It just didn't fit in my room.
Ahaha. I must go have a look.
Ah, I love that series!
Which book?
A book from the list, Black and Gold by Sam Sparro
Brittany.
Firefox has been going really slow on my comp, it keeps freezing. I'm using Chrome atm.
Ahh, right o. I guess, it has been out for a couple of years.
Well I'm sure many people haven't seen it.
That is a good movie.
We didn't start the fire! dadadadada etc etc.
lol, thank you.
Lol, they're following me as well.
thought 'All the single ladies' in Beyonce's new song was 'I want a cigarette' LMAO.
http://projectforawesome.com/
Tomorrow we will buy a toy each and put it under a giving tree. I'm sure there's one somewhere.
Lol. We are going to do a Project for Awesome video about Giving Trees, you know, when you put toys under them.
Ahh, well they're not here. You should get them onto twitter. Case closed: Gilligan's Island wins, 4-2.
Exactly. These people have to have a twitter account, follow me, then @reply me. That's the only way they will count.
You're clearly just making up names. No one called Kelly should be allowed an opinion.
No, You're meant to pick from the ones provided.
she looks like the ad of zac efron on the right, except what zac would look like if he weren't so good looking.
@Gemma742 @howzigoin88 Lets just accept that everyone has a different opinion, and move on.
Well she was a bitch, it's best she wasn't there.
She was, a lot. She wore a pink dress.
Lol, yeah. I read it because I heard it was good and chose to check it out, on the net, not because everyone was reading it.
I am quite literally a Twilight original. :D I WIN.
Yeah, I read it AGES ago. I was in Grade 11. No one knew about it.
I could say the same about Twilight. I read it more than two years ago.
Yeah, but if they're good, then they deserve something more.
I don't. I think they deserve popularity. It's good music, everyone should hear it.
It was well before anyone knew them here, when I first heard them. It was a glorious day.
That was the first Panic song I heard, many a moon ago.
Yes, I am quite enjoying it. To my surprise.
Telekinesis, or teleportation.
There's a version for chrome. I haz it.
It does, you have to download it for Chrome. I did that the other day.
Perhaps.
It's an awesome episode!
Coolios.
Yes, well not LOTR. I make few exceptions. Harry Potter would be an exception if they made them long.
"Stompron: the act of squishing Ron Weasley" That is brilliant.
I spent several hours just watching them, and I don't think I even got a quarter of the way through!
and I quote 'There's nothing on TV so I'm watching this rubbish'
Haha, what a brilliant typo!
Get to 10,000!
Lol, no they're not. Brendon Urie is the same age as Kevin Jonas.
Hmm...I think your brain has fallen out.
Lol, Panic have been nominated for two Grammys, and they were formed in 2005, same year as JB.
Popularity doesn't make them better.
Yes, they have actually. Two years in a row.
You know, this is the teen choice awards, where teenyboppers dominate the votes. It means nothing.
They won 3, Gemma looked it up, on the internet.
MTV Awards are all rigged, and made of fail.
If you twitter many more times, Twitter is going to lock you out.
Yay, Juno! <3
Panic At the Disco wins, for sure. <3 them.
Calm down.
Lying is the most fun a girl can have without taking her clothes off will forever be one of my favourite songs. Even when I'm 70.
Hopefully my CD arrives tomorrow, cause I'm very excited about it. :D
I am following over 100 people, not that I have over 100 followers. It'd be quite late if I had only just realised that. 75 people late.
I have this Claire Bowditch song on my mp3 player? Right on.
Has that god-awful gummy bear song stuck in my head. I shall go listen to something else.
http://the1001movies.blogspot.com/ My review of La Vie En Rose, with a new quote added at the bottom of the post, cause it's amazing
It would make sense to edit my NaNo novel, before beginning another one. Lyk omg 214 words so far.
I love Roy from the IT Crowd, and Moss, and Jen. Perhaps even Richmond.
Reading The Tales of Beedle the Bard by J.K. Rowling.
http://twitpic.com/qac1 - A definite fail.
Hmm. Beedle the Bard, Panic at the Disco or the IT Crowd? I have acquired too many awesome things in too short of an amount of time.
It's too late to say good afternoon, but saying good night sounds like I'm leaving. How troublesome.
Time to head off to work. Will be reading The Tales of Beedle the Bard beforehand. Shoop da woop. Off I go!
Just obtained a book about Chess, a book about making the LOTR trilogy, Doctor Doolittle and an encyclopedia.
Now to add them to Librarything.com
Just stole 11 books from @Gemma742's room. They all belong to me though. Enid Blyton, Roald Dahl and W.J. Corbett
Hi @allnewfollowers. You're awesome, unless you want to trick me into buying something.
This CD excites me so much. Especially as I got to go one of their concerts, with the same setlist. Wheee.
That Green Gentleman! :D Also, I now have 101 books listed on Librarything. Woot woot.
http://tinyurl.com/68vw55 Yay!
Ok, going to bed, night twitterverse!
I was tired, but am not tired now. Well, am a little. Banana.
A girl that I work with sounds just like Kim from Kath and Kim. I didn't even know people actually spoke like that.
http://tinyurl.com/5pxs7m A review. Sort of.
I'm so tired, I can barely review it. Lets do a quarter-assed one. Like half-assed, but with even less effort.
Now to blog a review. Or a fev, as I tried to type it.
Gigi finished.
Just pointed out the grammatical faults in the subtitles of this film. They used to, instead of too. Shame on them.
Will definitely be at the Melbourne Leuke and Chris gathering. Can't wait!
Power just went out for a little bit. We were watching a movie. How annoying.
Very loud thunder just now. Plus pouring rain.
Watching GiGi.
Home from work, finally. Some bitch yelled at me because she couldn't explain herself properly. Oh well.
Off to work now, til 6pm. Joyous. Well, prob won't get home til 7, cause gotta wait for sis to finish, then pick up blake.
McDonalds belts are made to be the slightest bit wider than the holes they go through on the pants. Why?
Now to find some socks, chuck on some shoes and head to the library, then work. Good bye, see you later!
The movie has ended. Yay!
Twenty or so minutes left.
This movie is too long for my liking. It's 140 mins or so.
Hello again. I am now watching Ikiru. A black and white japanese film from the 1950s
Off to do the ironing, watch the movie Ikiru and hopefully find it to be a good film. Pretty sure it's in Japanese.
http://tinyurl.com/5hgqpu Posted a blog about getting to 10,000. :D
:O new postsecrets!
Talking about literature is a great way to remove Blake from my room.
I'd like to thank twitter, my followers, that guy, Tom from MySpace, this box of a juice and a pair of purple scissors.
10000!!!!!! Now, where is the mental ward that I need to check into?
This is my 9999 tweet. Goodbye four digit numbers, it has been nice knowing you.
About to tweet 3 times in a row. Don't kill me, it's momentous.
Oh, and I must also go to the library, because there are about 4 or 5 movies to pick up.
Breakfast, then shower, then ironing, then video if there's time before work, then work, then editing video. Yay.
Good Morning and lol @stephenfry and his PC rant. :D
Going to bed now, got to get up at 8 or so. Night Night. Also, sent Hank an email about P4A cause I can't find much info about it.
*flees to the ning*
I am confused by this site. Where are the pics to download, why is there only one post, why is there no video explaining all this?
*Thursday morning.
Project for Awesome due the 14th? We are filming it on Wednesday Morning.
Yes, we are definitely doing the Starlight Children Foundation. It fits with our channel.
Hmm, there could be another charity we could do, cause we can't film the putting things under the tree.
There's now a 9:30am showing for Twilight at Pac Fair. The cinemas don't open til at least 9:45. Wtf?
http://tinyurl.com/6r5x5c Even better. Oh how I love Tyler Oakley.
http://tinyurl.com/6gnq6a :D I love it.
I have heard enough music today. I have now retired from the music world for today.
Gilmore Girls = 1, Gilligan's Island = 4. I name Gilligan's Island the winner, because at this rate we may as well.
http://abundanceofmusic.blogspot.com/ Reviewed In Rainbows, now to headeth to bedeth. Should really stop adding eth to words.
Lmao! Hiro is amazing. 'BAD MAN!'
Seth Green is in this episode. :D It's great.
They have 1/2 Frank Sinatra CDs on the list, at the library. Well, one is better than none, I guess.
I find it annoying that a couple of these songs have louder music than vocals. I keep trying to turn it up, but it doesn't work.
Thought the idea of listening to Radiohead would be torture, cause I normally do not like them, but the first song on 'In Rainbows' is great
I think I need a mac book. Windows Media Player takes a long time to open, and I'm not downloading itunes for this comp.
Heading off to work. It's way too hot here.
Oops, didn't turn my alarm off.
I set my alarm for 9am, awoke at 7:50am. Depressing.
Good night twitter!
Can hear neighbours loudly singing 'Jingle Bells' It's 11:44pm. Have a little decency, people!
Princess Diaries 10? That's still going?
Finished watching Braveheart. Why did Mel Gibson direct himself?
Sir William needs a haircut.
There's a heap of burning men on the screen. Brilliance.
They zoomed in, and he wasn't so good looking. Nevermind
Who is that reasonably good man in this movie? No, I'm not talking about Mel Gibson. It's an englishman.
Someone should get Peter Jackson to direct the final Harry Potter movie. At least mostly everything would be included.
Aw, this film goes for almost three hours. I hate long films.
No one is on msn and it's 8:18. Everyone is either very lazy, or has already gone out, which wouldn't be normal for my friends.
http://tinyurl.com/4f2eaz LMAO It's like the return of Jimmyboyz. :D
Why is 1001goals subscribed to some channel that posts Hannah Montana Episodes? Gemma shouldn't even be allowed to know the password
So, there's meant to be some people doing a youtube blackout today. So what do I do? I go straight to youtube. :P
Good morning, it's almost 8am, and today shall be made of awesome. Definitely.
Why can't everyone in the world just be at least a little bit happy? It would be so much nicer.
after seeing the awesome power of Nerdfighters, will never ever feel sad again. Although that's rare. I should be 'katofalwayshappy'
Hello my lovelies. How are we all?
Off to my dad's for dinnerz, fun times, and..er..stuff. Yes. Stuff.
Watching The IT Crowd, Season 2.
Needs to take a little video break. I've seen soooo many.
http://tinyurl.com/5gp4gt He needs more comments. Go comment now!
It sounds like someone is watching Camp Rock. They should be commenting on all these videos!
Comment, comment, comment. Fun times all around.
PROJECT FOR AWESOME THUMBNAIL IS THERE. YAYAYAY. Thank you!
Jonas Brothers are just the new Hanson, they'll get married young, have 8 kids between them, and be forgotten.
The Sweet Escape! :D I like this song.
11,000!!!!!!! I love you twitter, forever. All of you, you're all wonderful, amazing people.
Number 42 - Rapture by Blondie. Fail.
Has four hours and 15 minutes to tweet 5 times in order to get to 11,000 updates. I can't see this being a failed effort.
That's nice, deary.
Yummy dinnerz is ready now. Om nom nom, bbs.
Gemma just asked me if Jennifer Lopez was Beyonce. How do you confuse those?
